docs.snippet: Mickelson is not only relying on experience and an impalpable mojo to advance his chances at this week’s Masters, but also on his regained health....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mickelson is not only relying on experience and an impalpable mojo to advance his chances at this week’s Masters, but also on his regained health.
docs.abstract: Phil Mickelson, having regained his health following back injury, is again considered a serious contender at Masters tournament; Mickelson will be pursuing his fourth green jacket after victories in 2004, 2006 and 2010.

headline.main: For Phil Mickelson, Emotions Don’t Fade, Even 10 Years and 3 Green Jackets Later
headline.print_headline: For Mickelson, Emotions Don’t Fade, Even 10 Years and 3 Green Jackets Later
